DiamondAnimation

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • DiamondAnimation.Player

  • class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the player that occupies a AnimationPanel.GameField and that can move across the diamond.

        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate on the AnimationPanel.GameField
        y - y coordinate on the AnimationPanel.GameField
        polygon - shape for the player to move around on
